      • insertIntoDb

        public static void insertIntoDb(Context context,
                java.lang.String source,
                java.lang.String url,
                java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String userName)
        Insert Links into the Database.
        Parameters:
        {Context} - context Application Context
        {String} - source Source of Privly Link (FACEBOOK, TWITTER etc)
        {String} - url Privly Link
        {String} - id unique identifier on the Source Server of the message
        {String} - userName Name of the user who sent the message / email /tweet.
